heading.title: PMP Certification
heading.description: PMP® Certification pathway from CertScope will help you to understand PMP process groups and Knowledge areas as per updated PMBOK edition and assist in passing the Project Management Professional® exam in the first attempt.

certification_overview.title: Multiple delivery options
certification_overview.description: Delivery Options: Self Paced | Instructor-led Live Online | Traditional classroom.

certification_overview.title: Course completion certificate
certification_overview.description: 35 contact hour certificate will be issued after successful completion of the training.

certification_overview.title: Case studies
certification_overview.description: Seven (07) Industry Case Studies with more than 15 industry based scenarios.

certification_overview.title: Hands-on projects and practice tests
certification_overview.description: Five (05) hands-on projects and access to five (05) practice tests with 200 questions each.

list: Three simulation practice tests of 200 questions each

Live_online.title: LIVE ONLINE

know_more_title.title: Know more about PMP Certification

steps.label: Qualified mentor equals insightful mentee
steps.description: Our PMP training boot camps are delivered by PMP certified professionals with more than 15 years of relevant industry experience. They are experts who know what they teach and preach.

steps.label: Case studies and practical assignments
steps.description: Learn the various concepts of A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide) with the help of practical assignments and industry case studies.

steps.label: Hands on mentor-ship
steps.description: The mentor will determine your readiness for the examination and will assess the areas of your strengths and weakness. The trainer will guide you through the simulation examination and assist you in answering the long scenario-based questions. Those questions are based on the standards set by previous examinations.

steps.label: Guidance with examination
steps.description: Our training curriculum is based on PMI's latest version of A Guide to the Project Management Body of Knowledge (PMBOK® Guide). This guide includes 14 chapters. On successful completion of the training, our certification team will guide you through the certification process. We do stay till the end to see you succeed.

list: Build shared understanding about a project

faqs.Title: Starting the Project
list: Determine appropriate project methodology/methods and practices
Plan and manage budget and resources
Plan and manage quality of products and deliverables

faqs.Title: Doing the work
list: Execute project to deliver business value
Ensure knowledge transfer for project continuity

faqs.Title: Keeping the team on track
list: Address and remove impediments, obstacles, and blockers

faqs.Title: Keeping the business in mind
list: Evaluate and deliver project benefits and value
Evaluate and address internal and external business environment changes

learning_overview_desc.description: Get an overview of the training structure, modules, and methodology for PMP Certification training by CertScope training solutions.

description: Project management disciplines
PMP® application and examination procedure
Project management tools like project cost estimating, work breakdown structure, Gantt charts, mathematical project scheduling models, resource allocation, cost management and engineering economics
How to sit through and clear the PMP® certification examination.

certificationSteps.title: Start by choosing the desired delivery method of training
certificationSteps.description: You can choose from the classroom, Live online or self-paced learning delivery options. Choose which suits your needs the best. Once you enroll, the relevant designated course adviser will guide you on how to get started with the training.

certificationSteps.title: Complete the required hours of training
certificationSteps.description: All the 14 chapters of official PMBOK-6th edition will be covered during the training. At least 35 hours of learning is mandatory as recommended by PMI USA.

certificationSteps.title: Download the 35 Contact Hour Certificate
certificationSteps.description: Once the training is over, you will have to download the 35 contact hour certificate or course completion certificate from the LMS or our 24/7 support team will issue the same. This certificate is mandatory to apply for PMP examination.

certificationSteps.title: Submit the application at PMI
certificationSteps.description: Once you receive the certificate, you will have to start the application process at www.pmi.org, Once you submit the application, it will take 15 days to review the application and receive the eligibility number which is used to schedule an examination.

certificationSteps.title: Schedule the exam at nearest prometric centre.
certificationSteps.description: Once you receive the eligibility number, you will have to sign up at prometric.com, which is a portal to schedule the exam at any of the nearby prometric centers. After the completion of the examination, results will be sent across via email within 15 days.

resource_desc: The Ultimate Guide to PMP Certification: Tips and Tricks
How PMP Certification Can Elevate Your Career
Roadmap to Success: PMP Certification Exam Prep

description: This ethical hacking certification verifies the skills required to thrive in the information security domain.
Key issues include plaguing the information security world, ethical hacking, information security controls, laws, and standards.
Perform footprinting and reconnaissance using the latest footprinting techniques and tools as a critical pre-attack phase required in ethical hacking.
Different types of malware (Trojan, Virus, worms, etc.), system auditing for malware attacks, malware analysis, and countermeasures
Social engineering techniques and how to identify theft attacks to audit human level vulnerabilities and suggest social engineering countermeasures
Session hijacking techniques to discover network-level session management, authentication/authorization, cryptographic weaknesses, and countermeasures
Penetration testing, security audit, vulnerability assessment, and penetration testing roadmap.

heading.title: CISSP Certification
heading.description: The Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) certification Training by CertScope is for the professionals who would like to understand security practices and principles. CISSP is granted by International Information System Security Certification Consortium, also known as (ISC)². CISSP credential means that a you can effectively design, implement and manage a best cybersecurity program.

steps.label: Course Objective
steps.description: The CISSP course is designed to help you advance in your journey as an Information Security Professional. You will be equipped with the knowledge and expertise to master concepts and methods in IT Security

steps.label: Prerequisites for CISSP certification
steps.description: There are no prerequisites to attend the CISSP training. To be eligible for certification you must have at least five years of cumulative experience in two or more of the eight domains in the (ISC)² CISSP Common Body of Knowledge. Earning a 4-year college degree or regional equivalent or an additional credential from the (ISC)² approved list will satisfy 1 year of the required experience.

heading.title: ISO 27001 Lead Auditor Certification
heading.description: ISO/IEC 27001 specifies a management system that is intended to bring information security under management control and gives specific requirements. Organizations that meet the requirements may be certified by an accredited certification body following successful completion of an audit.

certification_overview.title: Multiple delivery options
certification_overview.description: Delivery Options: Self Paced | Instructor-led Live Online | Traditional classroom.

certification_overview.title: Hands-on projects and practice tests
certification_overview.description: Five (05) hands-on projects and access to five (05) practice tests with 200 questions each.

certification_overview.title: Case studies
certification_overview.description: Seven (07) Industry Case Studies with more than 15 industry based scenarios.

certification_overview.title: Exam and Certification
certification_overview.description: Exam and Certification is part of the program and will be conducted at the end of training.

know_more_title.title: Know more about ISO 27001 Certification program

steps.label: Comprehensive instructor-led training
steps.description: This 5 day ISO 27000 Lead Auditor course is designed to equip delegates with the skills and techniques of auditing and how to communicate the findings of the audit effectively to the management of the audited organization.

steps.label: Case studies and practical assignments
steps.description: Systematically examine the organization's information security risks, taking account of the threats, vulnerabilities, and impacts. Design and implement a coherent and comprehensive suite of information security controls and/or other forms of risk treatment (such as risk avoidance or risk transfer) to address those risks that are deemed unacceptable; and adopt an overarching management process to ensure that the information security controls continue to meet the organization's information security needs on an ongoing basis.

steps.label: Who should attend
steps.description: Individuals who want to become ISMS Registered Lead Auditors Individuals leading their companies to ISO 27001:2013 registration.It is also essential for anyone involved managing information and with a responsibility to design, implement and manage an ISMS management system that meets the requirements of ISO 27001:2013

certificationSteps.title: Choose the delivery method
certificationSteps.description: Choose your preferred delivery mode and complete the required training

certificationSteps.title: Complete the training
certificationSteps.description: Through an online workshop via webinar/or classroom you will enjoy enhanced learning opportunities through roleplay, case studies, and other activities. You will also work on developing the soft skills needed to prepare for the certification exam, and to excel as a certification auditor.

certificationSteps.title: Appear in the exam
certificationSteps.description: After you complete the training, you will be ready to take the final step: the certification exam. You can take this online exam from your home, your office, or any other place that is convenient for you.

certificationSteps.title: Appear in an online exam.
certificationSteps.description: After you complete the training, you will be ready to take the final step: the certification exam. You can take this online exam from your home, your office, or any other place that is convenient for you. This online exam has been certified by Exemplar Global (previously RABQSA), and you will receive your certificate once you successfully pass the test. This certification is highly regarded, serving as evidence that you are competent to perform certification audits according to ISO 27001.The fee for the exam is included in the price of the workshop, and you will have access to the exam after you schedule your workshop.

certificationSteps.title: Receive the Certificate
certificationSteps.description: Certificate of competence proves that you attended the auditor training course, and that you passed the exam certified by Exemplar Global (formerly RABQSA). This ensures that you understand and can apply the knowledge you gained in each of the course's modules.

heading.title: PfMP Certification
heading.description: Portfolio management is a highly effective approach for implementing strategic initiatives as it helps bridge the gap between strategy and execution. The research found that organizations with effective portfolio management achieved more than 62% success rate in meeting or exceeding expected return on investment for their products. Portfolio managers ensure that projects, programs, and operations are aligned with strategic objectives, and they invest resources in the right areas to deliver expected value.

description: You will have demonstrated advanced competency in coordinating the management of one or more portfolios to achieve strategic objectives.
You will learn how to align projects, programs, and operations with organizational strategy, and how to prioritize investments to deliver maximum value.
You will also learn how to balance risks and opportunities in the portfolio and ensure that resources are effectively allocated and managed.
Additionally, the certification program covers topics such as stakeholder engagement, governance, performance measurement, and communication.

faqs.Title: Basics of Six Sigma And Define Phase

learning_overview_desc.description: Get an overview of the training structure, modules, and methodology for Lean Six Sigma Black Belt certification training by CertScope training solutions.

description: 1. Mastery of Six Sigma Methodology: Black Belts will have a deep understanding of the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control) methodology and its application in solving complex business pr
2. Statistical Expertise: Black Belts will be proficient in statistical tools and techniques used for data analysis and process improvement.
3. Leadership in Process Improvement: Black Belts will possess strong leadership skills, enabling them to lead cross-functional teams in process improvement projects.
4. Project Management: Black Belts are adept at project management principles and tools.

5. Problem Solving: Black Belts are skilled problem solvers. They can identify, define, and prioritize business problems, develop hypotheses, and use data to uncover solutions that lead to process opt
6. Data Analysis: Black Belts have a high level of competence in data collection, analysis, and interpretation.
7. Process Optimization: Black Belts are experts in identifying opportunities for process optimization and waste reduction.
8. Quality Control: Black Belts understand principles of quality control and can implement effective control plans to ensure that processes remain stable and meet established quality standards.

9. Change Management: Black Belts are skilled in change management techniques. They can navigate resistance to change, facilitate smooth transitions, and ensure that improvements are sustained over ti
10. Effective Communication: Black Belts can communicate complex concepts and findings effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
11. Certification and Recognition: Upon completion of the certification, individuals receive a recognized credential that demonstrates their expertise in Six Sigma.
12. Continuous Improvement Culture: Black Belts are well-equipped to foster a culture of continuous improvement within their organizations.

know_more_title.title: Know more about Six Sigma Green Belt Certification

steps.label: Six Sigma Green-belt introduction
steps.description: Six Sigma Green Belt course focuses on providing students with an understanding of the various Six Sigma tools and techniques. These tools and techniques are useful in improving the production process and help to minimize defects in the end product. This course lays greater emphasis on the practical implementation of these tool and techniques in the organization.

steps.label: Target profiles
steps.description: This course is ideally suitable for the professionals having the roles (but not limited to) – Project Manager, Program Manager, Business Development Manager, Commodity Manager, Quality Manager, Business Manager or Consultant, Financial/Business Analyst, and a lot more.

know_more_title.title: Know more about Design Thinking Certification

steps.label: Who Should Enroll in this Program
steps.description: The Design Thinking Certification course is tailored for individuals and organizations aiming to boost business efficiency. It's ideal for CXOs, Functional Heads, Entrepreneurs, Top/Middle Management Professionals, Product Managers, Sales, and Marketing teams. By embracing Design Thinking principles, participants can drive innovation, address complex challenges, and foster creativity in their respective domains.

steps.label: Program Features
steps.description: The Design Thinking Certification course spans 16 hours of instructor-led online training, conveniently structured over 2 days. Upon completion, participants receive an industry-recognized certificate. Through hands-on projects, assignments, and real-life case studies, learners gain practical insights and skills to apply Design Thinking principles effectively in their professional endeavors.

certificationSteps.title: Enroll for the course
certificationSteps.description: Enroll for the course and your account manager will guide you will all the details of the online/classroom/self paced session, you will get online access before the actual training date.

certificationSteps.title: Complete the Assignments given by the trainer
certificationSteps.description: You will be given assignments by the trainer; you will have to complete the same in the given timeframe. You would need to ensure 100% attendance in the training.

certificationSteps.title: Appear in the exam online
certificationSteps.description: At the end of the training, you will have to register for exam online, the trainer  will take you through the complete application process and will help you to write the exam.
